DOC.criteria: Full permanent dentition include incisor , canine , premolar , first molar Teeth sound , noncarious buccal enamel pretreatment chemical agent hydrogen peroxide No previous orthodontic treatment fix appliance Mental/emotional/developmental disability Cleft lip and/or palate , craniofacial anomaly , syndrome Obvious oral hygiene issue excessive plaque accumulation , gingivitis , and/or preexist white spot lesion Prosthodontic restore substrate extend labial surface maxillary teeth Known allergy acrylate contain study material
